Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Sub_Crime_Type: Threats by employer related to refusal to participate in criminal activities
Crimes.Victim_Status: Employee who refused to engage in criminal conduct
Crimes.Threat_Source: Employer due to non-compliance with criminal demands
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Alleged connection to organized crime and drug trafficking
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: No evidence of nationwide influence of perpetrator
Crimes.Prior_Criminality: Not applicable to victim; perpetrator linked to narcotics trafficking
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Insufficient to prove inability to relocate or lack of state protection
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Affidavit, legal letter from Mexican lawyer
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Limited weight given to Mexican lawyer's letter due to timing
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant did not demonstrate efforts to seek state protection
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Low risk in other parts of Mexico
Crimes.Jurisdiction: Mexican jurisdiction, reviewed under Canadian law
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Failure to report to authorities or show reasonableness of non-reporting
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Federal Court judicial review of Immigration and Refugee Board decision
Crimes.Government_Body_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim based on violence and threats
Crimes.Sub_Crime_Type: Physical assault and threats by criminal employer
Crimes.Victim_Status: Employee subjected to violence for non-cooperation
Crimes.Threat_Source: Hugo Sanchez, employer and alleged drug trafficker
Crimes.Aggravating_Factors: Pattern of threats and physical violence
Crimes.Mitigating_Factors: Possibility of internal relocation within Mexico
Crimes.Evidence_Sufficiency: Insufficient to prove no internal flight alternative
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Self-reported incidents, lack of police reports
Crimes.Evidence_Credibility: Questioned due to lack of corroboration or reporting
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant failed to report incidents to authorities
Crimes.Risk_Assessment: Risk deemed localized and avoidable via relocation
Crimes.Risk_Nature: Non-state actor threat with limited geographic reach
Crimes.Jurisdiction: Mexican domestic jurisdiction, assessed under Canadian immigration law
Crimes.Procedural_Issues: Lack of engagement with state protection mechanisms
Crimes.Legal_Procedure: Federal Court review of IRB decision

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim involving allegations of interference with justice
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Feasibility of internal relocation and access to state protection
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Tribunal weighed Mexican lawyer’s letter as low credibility due to timing
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to prove no safe internal refuge
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Delay in submitting supporting documentation affected reliability
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Internal flight alternative must be reasonable and safe
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution by drug trafficker
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Letter from Mexican lawyer, size and diversity of Mexico
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Inability to safely relocate within Mexico
Crimes.Jurisdiction: Canada (Federal Court), original events in Mexico

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim linked to involvement in drug trafficking operations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issue: Lack of proof regarding state protection failure
Crimes.Procedural_Requirement: Burden on applicant to prove well-founded fear
Crimes.Risk_Nexus: Connection between refusal to traffic drugs and threats received
Crimes.Basis_for_Decision: Availability of safe relocation within Mexico
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Denial: Lack of demonstrated risk in alternative locations
Crimes.Risk_Assessment_Factors: Geographic size of Mexico, absence of nationwide threat
Crimes.Accusation: Forced recruitment into drug trafficking, refusal led to threats
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to provide sufficient evidence of danger
Crimes.Credibility_Findings: Applicant did not prove inability to relocate or seek protection
Crimes.Risk_Persecution: Not established as systematic or unavoidable
Crimes.Mode_of_Entry: Asylum claim at port of entry or inland
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Internal flight alternative and state protection
Crimes.Relevant_Factors_Considered: Size of Mexico, urban diversity, limited criminal influence
